item.title: GraphQL - TL;DR
item.description: GraphQL — TL;DR Facebook develops GraphQL in 2015. On 7 November 2018, the GraphQL project was moved from Facebook to the newly-established GraphQL Foundation. Lee Byron https://leebyron.com/ is co-creator of GraphQL at Facebook GraphQL is a data query and manipulation language for APIs. It can be alternative to REST API or co-exist with REST API GraphQL is not a query language of GraphDB but you can use GraphDB with GraphQL.
